Uses of Interface
org.jaxen.expr.XPathExpr

  • Packages that use XPathExpr 
    Package Description
    org.jaxen
    This package defines the core Jaxen API to the XPath engine.
    org.jaxen.expr
    Interfaces and default implementations for XPath expression components.
